name: Gemtext Document
summary: Learn about .GMI files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Gemini is an internet communication protocol that is meant to complement HTTPS and Gopher. It was originally developed in 2019 by Solderpunk and has since been iterated upon by a community of users.
Just as webpages served via HTTPS are written and formatted using HTML, webpages served via Gemini are formatted using Gemtext. These documents are then saved as GMI files.
Links to other files and webpages
Additionally, GMI files can contain lines that begin with ```. Gemini clients always print lines that start with ``` as-is, without applying the rules of Gemtext formatting.

description: A GMI file is a Gemtext document. It contains text that is meant to be served over the internet and translated into a webpage using the Gemini protocol. The text GMI files contain is written in the Gemtext markup language.

instructions: You can open and edit a GMI file with Microsoft Visual Studio Code (multiplatform) or any other text editor. You can use Geminaut (Windows), Lagrange (multiplatform), and other Gemini clients to view the webpage a GMI file describes.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .gmi file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
images.caption: GMI file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
